tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** ******** ***** ** *** ** **** ******* * **** ********* ****  
Doctor is so compassionate towards patient , she is highly skilled , prescribes exactly what is needed for the patient and she never asks us to take unnecessary blood tests for the kid , one time I visited on 5th day of my son’s fever , still doctor said , “ he is active and playful , we can wait for few more days, he will be alright “ . She cares for the kids , She explains about treatment thoroughly and she listens to us , *** ** *** ** *** **** ******** I strongly recommend the doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ** *** *** **** ************* ** *** **** ********* ** *** ***********she won't suggest any syrups with more power and never suggest for antibiotics unnecessarily. My baby became normal in couple of days after my visit. And this Is not my first visit. In each of my visit i will be really surprised **** *** ******* ********** I would strongly recommend her for any mother because I know how mothers will think if babies are not well and what they usually search for. *** ** *** ****** *** *** ***** ******i don't have any other words to explain about her treatment ***** **** ******** *** ******** *** ******* ********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Such a darlin doctor I'd say. I feel so secured when she handles ma son. I can jus leave him with her and not evn check on him cuz she's that trust worthy and protecting and carin. She handles each child like her own. So understandin and so patient and she still remembers me runnin to her cryin cuz ma baby was a blue baby and she jus gave me so much of confidence and expalined thins that I was nvr again scared when ma use to turn blue cuz of breath holdin spell. She's a blessin, ** ***** ** ********* I highly recommend her. ***** **** ******.. God bless u Doc...

tags: None
review: I am amazed by her memory each time that she remembers the entire case history of my son whenever i visit her. That gives me confidence that she is indeed following his health closely and must be the most suitable doctor for him. She is very friendly, and answers your questions patiently and also gives reasons for her decisions - all that would make you feel confidence on her treatment. I found this doctor after a wrong diagnosis of another one but during my first visit itself she impressed me. I would always go to her for my kid if she is in Bangalore, no matter which hospital she consults.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ** ******** ** *** ** *** **** ********* *********** **** * **** *** *** ******** ** ******** ***** The doctor patiently listened to out concerns before she explained the root causes and the course of treatment. She was generous in giving enough time to clarify all our  doubts and questions during the consultation. One is immediately relived and reassured that they are in safe hands after you have spoken to her.  Extremely friendly  and competent doctor with whom you immediately make a connection and can sense her passion for the job. Highly recommend consulting Dr Anuradha for any pediatric concerns.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Anuradha I have nothing but to always thank her for being so kind and a great doctor.she is not looking at a child as a child but as her own. Kind of attention and help she has provided for my twin babies I have great regards towards her. She will not give up and provide antibiotic, her faith towards a child is more . She looks at minimal medicines at first go . Patience and love towards every child is remarkable. Im assured that my kids will be fine the moment they are sick just because I have Doctor Anuradha my side. 
Thanks for everything doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Anuradha is extremely polite and humble. She understands what parents go through when they see children suffer and us quite reassuring. My son had viral fever for more than 7 days that resulted in secondary bacterial infection and earlier doctor I visited has administered anti-viral although all tests were negative and could not reach her at all over the weekend for any advice when my son was suffering from side affects and was continously vomitting. He had also become extremely weak. My paediatrician friend suggested to stop anti-viral and consult Doctor for examinatiob of chest. I visited Springleaf and Dr. Anuradha had been quite kind and comforting and reassured everything would be alright and prescribed the right medicines. In contrast another popular paediatrician at a nearby hospital was extremely rude when I requested nurse/sister to seek his advice on lab tests to be performed for my ailing children, something rhat needed just 2 minutes of his time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Anuradha is very friendly and see my kid like a family and doctor medicine is very effective and appreciate the clear explanations during each visit, making me feel informed and confident in the care my child.Dr. Anuradha  's patience and attentiveness to our questions have made a significant positive impact.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Friendly doctor, her way of treating the patients is wonderful, recommend to visit this doctor, overall nice experience

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: i have been visiting mam since few months now for my 6 months old son..A devine mother cum doctor she is .. i am so happy that I have met her in this life, very genuine humble and listens and addresses all the concerns. ****** ********* *********** **********. all her suggestions are easy to follow and easily available at home. be it anything related to my son,she is the go to person for me. highly recommended.

She is a very supportive and friendly person.She is warm, compassionate and sincere and deeply cares about each of her patients. Her commitment is what every parent should expect from a pediatrician. God bless Dr. Anuradha Mam and keep her healthy for children's benefit. Thank you very much.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Excellent doctor n we feel so grateful to have found her n been visiting her for last 5 years. She never recommends strong medicines n always does a thorough diagnosis before prescribing medicines. Vey friendly and always willing to hear out the concerns. God bless her.

tags: Wait time,
review: The first time we visited her, when my 2 year old son had 104 fever for 4 days and she said it looks like Dengue and prescribed the test and it was positive. Before which we had consulted 2 other experienced pediatricians and they could not diagnoze it. Very very impressive. Very friendly. Strong dose of medicine and antibiotics only if absolutely necessary. Explains everything clearly and even gives all the advices for future precautions. I would strongly recommend her. God bless her.
